meanings.definition: Covered by or provided with an awning.
meanings.sent1: The outdoor cafe had an awninged area for customers to enjoy their meals in the shade.
meanings.sent2: The house with the awninged windows looked cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a comfortable spot under the awninged patio and took a long nap.
meanings.sent4: The awninged entrance to the store welcomed shoppers with its colorful design.
meanings.sent5: The awninged deck shielded the family from the hot sun during their barbecue.

meanings.sent1: The awninged shop front provided shelter for customers waiting in line.
meanings.sent2: The awninged balcony offered a perfect spot for morning coffee with a view.
meanings.sent3: The awninged carport kept the vehicles cool on hot summer days.
meanings.sent4: The awninged entrance to the park added a touch of elegance to the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The awninged windows of the restaurant created a charming atmosphere for diners.
